front.title: Mobile IP version 6 Route Optimization Security Design Background

abstract.t: This document is a succint account of the rationale behind the MobileIPv6 (MIPv6) Route Optimization Security Design. The purpose of thisdocument is to present the thinking and to preserve the reasoningbehind the Mobile IPv6 Security Design in 2001-2002.The document has two target audiences: (1) MIPv6 implementors (sothat they can better understand the design choices in MIPv6 securityprocedures); and (2) people dealing with mobility or multi-homing (sothat they can avoid a number of potential security pitfalls in theirdesign).
